price: We have adorned the sky with the beauty of the stars,
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
